mapper.sql: tl.TXN_PRIMARY_KEY, tl.SETTLE_DATE, tl.ORG_TXN_PRIMARY_KEY, tl.DMS_RELATED_KEY, tl.ORG_DMS_RELATED_KEY, tl.TRANS_ID, tl.TRANS_ST, tl.TERM_CODE, tl.SHOP_CODE, tl.MCHNT_CODE, tl.INS_CODE, tl.RESP_CODE, tl.PRI_ACCT_NO, tl.CARD_NO, tl.USER_NAME, tl.PRODUCT_CODE, tl.TRANS_AMT, tl.ORG_TRANS_AMT, tl.TRANS_CURR_CD, tl.CARD_ATTR, tl.TRANS_CHNL, tl.TRANS_FEE, tl.TRANS_FEE_TYPE, tl.TFR_IN_ACCT_NO, tl.TFR_OUT_ACCT_NO, tl.ADDITIONAL_INFO, tl.REMARKS, tl.CREATE_TIME, tl.UPDATE_TIME
